com.hazelcast.nio.tcp

Class PlainChannelInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.nio.tcp.PlainChannelInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelInitializer

    public class PlainChannelInitializer
extends Object
implements ChannelInitializer
    A ChannelInitializer that runs on a member and used for unencrypted channels. It will deal with the exchange of protocols and based on that it will set up the appropriate handlers in the pipeline.

    • Method Detail

      • initChannel

        public void initChannel(Channel channel)
        Description copied from interface: ChannelInitializer
        Initializes the channel. So it will set up the (initial) pipeline of handlers, configure the underlying transport (socket e.g.).
        Specified by:
        initChannel in interface ChannelInitializer
        Parameters:
        channel - the Channel to initialize.
